label_category_helper: Label categories are groups for organizing product specifications. For example, in clothing, "Size" is a :labelCategory. During label creation, labels like "S", "M", "L" are assigned to the "Size" category. Well-organized categories help your customers find products easily. Better customer experience equals more sales!
status_helper: A status shows the condition of your products. For example, in books, "Damaged" is a :status. During status assignment, all books can be marked as "Damaged", or a specific number of them (like "3 out of 15 books"). Well-organized statuses help you track your inventory accurately.
